description.value:
The ghost stares at a creature it can see within 30 feet. The target takes @Damage[1d6[void]] damage + 1d6 per 2 levels with a @Check[type:will|dc:]{basic Will} save.

A creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.

For DCs, use the high spell DC of the ghost's level.
